entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Runtime test `simpleprovidervalidation.sh` failing on CI #81859
  • [6.0] HostActivation Tests windows x86 build failure #81851
  • [release/6.0] The target framework 'net5.0' is out of support and will not receive security updates in the future #81850
  • Optimize `lsraRegOrder` and `buildPhysRegRecords` to skip non-AVX512 registers if AVX512 not available #81847
    8.0.0
  • Update Linux/Mac Context State for AVX512 #81846
    8.0.0
  • RawData setter not accounted for in some X.509 / Pkcs extensions' memoization #81844
  • Question: Named pipes: await JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsync<T> blocks, when reading from Named pipe #81840
  • Allow for "archiving" of SPMI-generated diffs #81838
    Future
  • Code coverage failing for corelib #81835
  • [API Proposal]: Initialization constructor for collections #81834
  • STJ source generator does not correctly wrap custom converters on nullable properties #81833
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace with separate source/destination buffers #81829
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add span based apis for Array.CreateInstance/GetValue/SetValue #81826
  • JsonConverter<decimal> rounds number, even after overriding Write(...) method in custom converter #81825
  • Optimize integer arithmetic and logical operations on the values stored in vector registers, like internal representation of a floating-point number #81823
  • There're two 'EnumCalendarInfoCallback' in System.Private.CoreLib that mono-llvm-PInvoke dont support .. #81813
  • PublishAot affects non-AOT behavior #81803
  • Quic should support OpenSSL 3.x #81801
    8.0.0

Closed

  • NativeAot publish fail #81584
  • NumberFormatInfo still differs between operating systems, even in .NET 5+ - different number of decimal places #81853
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.sh #77240
  • [linux-arm64] Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh on #78168
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failure `GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh` #80213
  • GC crash in background_mark_simple1() #81154
  • Inconsistent behavior in `SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient` across win/linux #81590
    8.0.0
  • Wire the bootstrap build for illink #79054
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fast path serialization not working with combined contexts #71933
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Quaternion and Plane with LLVM as backend #81483
    Future
  • .NET 7, Linux, SSL connection is being reused between independent HttpClients? #79869
    7.0.x
  • .Net 7 Distributed Transaction - scope.Dispose() block process #81469
  • Assertion in libraries-jitstress System.Numerics.Tests.PlaneTests:PlaneToStringTest #81739
  • Blazor wasm DateOnly.DayOfWeek not localized #81820
  • [TestFailures] EventSource_ExistsWithCorrectId fails on NativeAoT #81824
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ReferenceHandlerTests_Default_String.ArrayPreserveDuplicateObjects #81670
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json issue with interface inheritance #81815
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with PGO data #81690
    8.0.0
  • Change the default package for the "Used By" section on GitHub #81078
  • Ensure illink packages flow to source build #80319
    8.0.0
  • Consolidate Microsoft.DotNet.Cecil* libraries into one nuget package #77692
  • Logging isnt shown and exception isnt thrown when using aspnet:6.0.13-alpine3.17-amd64 #81218
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Improvements on `Queue<T>` and `Stack<T>` #80327
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow root path for Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.SpecialDirectories #81861
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Skip `tracing/eventpipe/simpleprovidervalidation/` on wasm #81860
    test-failure, arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Update arm queues #81858
  • Fix AllocateRegularStaticBox for FOH #81857
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Skip TestNativeLibraryProbingOnPathEnv on macOS #81856
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reset errno before the fallback in getexepath #81852
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [release/6.0] Supress Check EOL Target Framework #81848
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix vector's Narrow intrinsics #81843
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix a couple of JsonConstructor bugs & clean up JsonParameterInfo implementation. #81842
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • update alpine test images #81841
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix src/tests/build.sh argument processing #81836
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Replace some single-char strings with chars #81831
    area-Meta
  • Validate the Kept attribute against the presence of EEType in NativeAOT #81830
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] handle PDB files as asset type #81828
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • XmlWriter respects NewLineOnAttributes when writing xmlns #81822
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • evaluate-default-paths.yml: Add paths for wasi #81817
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update message #81816
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [wasm] Optimize out redundant null checks in the jiterpreter #81811
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81805
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81804
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.4
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.4
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][loader] Set status on success #80951
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80881
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Update arm queues #81712
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure CNS_VEC and BLK are handled for setLclRelatedToSIMDIntrinsic #81760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Minimally light up Quaternion and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80873
    Servicing-approved, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #81238
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • Refine corerun instructions. Improve argument parsing in src/tests/build. #81733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [Mono] Fix typo in arm64-codegen.h #81845
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Handle promoted struct liveness updates properly in forward sub #81789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • don't send server_name when literal IP #81631
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [json] Use S.R.I vectors in JsonReaderHelper #81758
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/7.0] fix TLS resume with client certificates on Linux #81795
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80872
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Improve servicing docs for Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #81800
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid omitting copies for struct fields passed implicitly by reference #81787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix race condition when accessing nested JsonTypeInfo metadata #81821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Prevent unwinding through stack bottom #81770
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update version of Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task #81772
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with native PGO #81716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2107735 #81700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix handling of the generic byreflike constraint #81684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Pin the version of chrome used for tests - `109.0.5414.119` #81814
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] More Windows Arm64 helix queues 10->11 #81807
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] More Windows Arm64 helix queues 10->11 #81808
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81802
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] [jiterp] Add optimized C version of STFLD_O that uses correct write barrier #81806
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0][Android] Disable 32-bit nfloat tests #81735
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer (#80548) #81349
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #81042
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Add error code to the assert error message #80702
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.15
  • Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81545
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • Update branding to 6.0.15 #81776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.4 #81777
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #81157
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 7.0.4
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add star into link attributes #81407
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/6.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81307
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create throws IndexOutOfRangeException and other bugs #81291
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.15
  • Skip generating code for uint->long casts #81793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT: add concept of edge likelihood #81738
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • We can't pass source-build properties externally, they need to come via SourceBuild.props #81790
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Starting metrics before runtime start leads to a crash #81308
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.4
  • Improve performance of ConfigurationBinder (#81183) #81660
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action

    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.4

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x

    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [coop][interp] Fix GC transitions for thunk invoke wrappers #81773
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools that are used by the repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] X64 - Peephole optimization to skip emitting `movsxd` #81721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/7.0] prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81797

  • Intrinsify `CreateSpan` in static constructor interpreter #81747

  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960

  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code #81611
